code: import URL from'url-parse';export function getFilename(url){var _ref=new URL(url,{}),pathname=_ref.pathname;return pathname.substring(pathname.lastIndexOf('/')+1);}export function getFileExtension(url){var filename=getFilename(url);var dotIndex=filename.lastIndexOf('.');return dotIndex>0?filename.substring(dotIndex):'';}export function getManifestBaseUrl(manifestUrl){var urlObject=new URL(manifestUrl,{});if(urlObject.protocol==='exp:'){urlObject.set('protocol','http:');}else if(urlObject.protocol==='exps:'){urlObject.set('protocol','https:');}var directory=urlObject.pathname.substring(0,urlObject.pathname.lastIndexOf('/')+1);urlObject.set('pathname',directory);urlObject.set('query','');urlObject.set('hash','');return urlObject.href;}
